budget_reality_check.assessment: The original €1,000 budget for 22 days (€45.45/day) is extremely tight for this itinerary, especially with shopping priorities. Even with aggressive cuts, realistic minimum is ~€900-1,000. The current plan at €2,597.74 is unrealistic. To meet budget, user must choose: (A) Shopping priority: cut entertainment and activities to fund €300-400 shopping, or (B) Experience priority: cut shopping to €50-100 to fund activities and entertainment, or (C) Ultra-budget mode: eliminate all non-essential spending (Scenario 3 above).
budget_reality_check.recommendation: Implement Scenario 2 (Moderate optimization) to meet €1,000 budget. This preserves essential experiences (photography at budget studio, key attractions, some shopping) while cutting luxury spending (designer boutiques, premium spa, paid museums). Requires cooking ~50% of meals and focusing on free attractions.
